title: Voice Control Basics
description: Learn how to talk naturally to AI and get started with voice-first workflows

sections.heading: Why Voice Changes Everything
content: Typing is slow. Your brain thinks faster than your fingers can move. When you talk to AI, you unlock a more natural way to work. You can explain complex ideas while walking, driving, or doing other tasks. Voice lets you multitask in ways typing never could.

Research backs this up: A Stanford University study found that speech is **3x faster** than typing on mobile devices (150 words per minute vs 40 WPM), with a **20% lower error rate**. You can dictate a 500-word email in 3 minutes. Typing that same email might take 12-15 minutes.

examples.title: ✅ DO: Talk naturally, like you're explaining to a colleague
examples.example: Hey, I need to write an email to my team about next week's meeting. Make it friendly but professional. Include the agenda items we discussed yesterday.

examples.title: ❌ DON'T: Talk like a robot or use formal commands
examples.example: Computer. Compose electronic mail. Subject: Meeting. Body: Formal greeting...

sections.heading: Built-In Voice Features
sections.intro: Most AI tools now have voice built right in. You don't need special software to get started:

tools.name: ChatGPT Advanced Voice
tools.description: Natural conversation mode. Just tap the headphone icon and start talking. Works on mobile and desktop.

tools.name: Claude Voice
tools.description: Voice input available in the mobile app. Great for on-the-go conversations and quick questions.

tools.name: Perplexity Assistant
tools.description: Voice search and conversation. Perfect for research while multitasking.

tools.name: Google Gemini Voice
tools.description: Integrated with Google services. Use voice to search, create, and manage tasks.

callout.title: Try This Right Now (5 minutes):
steps: Tap the headphone icon to start voice mode
Say: 'I need to write a quick update email to my team about our project status. Keep it brief and positive.'
Listen to the AI's response, then say: 'Make it more casual' or 'Add a bullet list'
Copy the result and send it!
callout.footer: That's it. You just created something in 2 minutes that would have taken 10-15 minutes to type.

sections.heading: The Science Behind Voice Efficiency
content: Multiple studies confirm that voice input dramatically outperforms typing:
**Speed:** Average speaking speed is 150-180 words per minute, while average typing speed is only 38-40 WPM. Professional typists reach 65-75 WPM - still slower than casual speech.
**Multitasking:** Research shows hands-free communication tools increase productivity by 8.5% and employee satisfaction by 3.5%.
**Cognitive Load:** Voice typing reduces mental overhead by enabling natural thought expression, reducing mental fatigue compared to translating thoughts into finger movements.
**Accuracy:** Modern speech recognition (2016 onwards) achieves 20-63% lower error rates than mobile typing, depending on language.
Sources: Stanford University (2016), Vonage Research, SpeakOneAI cognitive load studies
